title: Clannad - Celtic Themes - The Very Best Of (2008)
description:
Clannad - Celtic Themes
The Very Best of Clannad
# Audio CD (10 Mar 2008)
# Number of Discs: 1
# Label: Sonybmg
Rip 320/kbs
All Covers included

With their roots firmly cemented in Irish folk, Clannad became one of Ireland&#039;s most popular exports
when they bridged the gap between contemporary pop and folk at the beginning of the eighties.
This eighteen track compilation brings together all of the band&#039;s finest moments including
such classicsas &#039;Theme From Harry&#039;s Game&#039; and &#039;Robin (The Hooded Man)&#039;.
Also included are duets with Bono, Bruce Hornsby and Maire Brennan&#039;s solo outing with trance outfit Chicane.
